data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Hai-Jian, Shi, Fu-Ming (2017): One new species of the genus Xizicus (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae) from Chongqing, China. Zootaxa 4286 (4): 593-596, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4286.4.12|2 occurrences
